Hoc35erGZCnNGdvm.name: Suffocating Sap
Hoc35erGZCnNGdvm.description:
Requirements: A hand free, a tanglefoot bag

Make a ranged weapon attack against a creature within 15 feet with the tanglefoot bag, expending it. On a hit, the contents cover the creature’s head. The target is blinded and cannot breathe while its head is covered this way, and must either make a Strength save as an action against your maneuver DC or an allied creature can make a Medicine check as an action with the same DC to free its head from the sap. A creature that doesn’t need to breathe is still blinded. The sap can also be removed by damaging it as per the normal use of a tanglefoot bag.
